problems.title: Basic Class
problems.description: Create a class `Person` with attributes `name` and `age`, and a method `introduce`.

visible_test_cases.expected_output: Hello, my name is Alice and I am 30 years old.
visible_test_cases.output: Hello, my name is Alice and I am 30 years old.

hidden_test_cases.expected_output: Hello, my name is Bob and I am 25 years old.
hidden_test_cases.output: Hello, my name is Bob and I am 25 years old.

problems.title: Inheritance
problems.description: Create a class `Student` that inherits from `Person` and adds a method `study`.

visible_test_cases.expected_output:

I am studying.

problems.title: Polymorphism
problems.description: Create a method `speak` in the `Person` class and override it in the `Student` class.

visible_test_cases.expected_output: Alice says: Hello, I am a student!
